Detailed Description

This action adds random movement to the particles.

The jitter PSA can effect a random jitter to either position or velocity or both at once.

There is a vector generator specified for both effects.

void JitterPSA::affectPosition ( bool  flag  ) 

This is the Set-Accessor for the affectPosition property of the JitterPSA.

Parameters:
flag The new value of affectPosition.

bool JitterPSA::affectPosition ( void   )  const

This is the Get-Accessor for the affectPosition property of the JitterPSA.

If this is set to true, then the positions of each particle will be jittered by the random amount from the position generator.

Returns:
The current status of the affectPosition flag.

void JitterPSA::affectVelocity ( bool  flag  ) 

This is the Set-Accessor for the affectVelocity property of the JitterPSA.

Parameters:
flag The new value of affectVelocity.

bool JitterPSA::affectVelocity ( void   )  const

This is the Get-Accessor for the affectVelocity property of the JitterPSA.

If this is set to true, then the velocities of each particle will be jittered by the random amount from the position generator.

Returns:
The current status of the affectVelocity flag.
